Sentencas: A short stack composed of six micro-tubular fuel cells was fabricated in order to study its electrochemical performance under different electrical connection configurations (parallel, series and parallel-series) at intermediate temperatures.
Titulo: Electrochemical performance of a short tubular solid oxide fuel cell stack at intermediate temperatures

Sentencas: Two cells were in the Ni-YSZ/YSZ/Pr2NiO4-YSZ system and four were in the Ni-YSZ/YSZ/Nd2NiO4-YSZ configuration, of which one failed following testing at 600 degrees C. Overall, individual cells had similar performance delivering 202, 302 and 340 mW/cm(2) at 600, 650 and 700 degrees C, respectively.
Titulo: Electrochemical performance of a short tubular solid oxide fuel cell stack at intermediate temperatures

Sentencas: The stack delivered a maximum of 7.40, 1032 and 11.56 W at these temperatures.
Titulo: Electrochemical performance of a short tubular solid oxide fuel cell stack at intermediate temperatures

Sentencas: No significant differences were found among different arrangements.
Titulo: Electrochemical performance of a short tubular solid oxide fuel cell stack at intermediate temperatures

Sentencas: However, as expected, the stack performance was most affected by the malfunctioning cell under a series arrangement at 600 degrees C.
Titulo: Electrochemical performance of a short tubular solid oxide fuel cell stack at intermediate temperatures

Sentencas: Since the parallel-series configuration delivers an intermediate voltage and current and similar power to the parallel or series connections, it can be more suitable for stack assembly.
Titulo: Electrochemical performance of a short tubular solid oxide fuel cell stack at intermediate temperatures

Sentencas: Such an arrangement also offers the possibility of replacement of a stack module in case a cell fails in that module during operation.
Titulo: Electrochemical performance of a short tubular solid oxide fuel cell stack at intermediate temperatures

Sentencas: A repairable fuel cell stack eliminates the negative economic impacts caused by a malfunctioning cell which, in extreme cases, can lead to the complete loss of the valuable energy conversion device.
Titulo: Electrochemical performance of a short tubular solid oxide fuel cell stack at intermediate temperatures
